snippet: Justin Gatlin won the 60 meters at the world indoor championships, posting the same time he had when winning the same title before his doping ban.
abstract: American sprinter Justin Gatlin wins the 60 meters at the world indoor championships, posting the same time he had when winning the same title in 2003 before his doping ban.
lead_paragraph: Justin Gatlin won the 60 meters at the world indoor championships, posting the same time he had when winning the same title before his doping ban.

headline.seo: Fastest Over 60 Meters, Gatlin Eyes Gold in Olympic 100
headline.main: Fastest Over 60 Meters, Gatlin Eyes Gold in 100
headline.print_headline: Fastest Over 60 Meters, Gatlin Eyes Gold in 100
